verses.verse: how he <S%H7650>swore<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and <S%H5087>vowed<s%> to the <S%H46>Mighty<s%> One of <S%H3290>Jacob:<s%>
"Surely I will not <S%H935>come<s%> into the <S%H168>structure<s%> of my <S%H1004>house,<s%> nor go <S%H5927>up<s%> into my <S%H6210>bed;<s%>
I will not <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H8153>sleep<s%> to my <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> or <S%H8572>slumber<s%> to my <S%H6079>eyelids;<s%>
until I find <S%H4672>out<s%> a <S%H4725>place<s%> for <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> a <S%H4908>dwelling<s%> for the <S%H46>Mighty<s%> One of <S%H3290>Jacob.<s%>"
<S%H8085>Behold,<s%> we heard of it in <S%H672>Ephrathah.<s%> We <S%H4672>found<s%> it in the <S%H7704>field<s%> of <S%H3293>Jaar:<s%>
"We will <S%H935>go<s%> into his <S%H4908>dwelling<s%> <S%H7812>place.<s%> We will worship at his <S%H1916>footstool.<s%>
<S%H6965>Arise,<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> into your <S%H4496>resting<s%> <S%H727>place;<s%> you, and the ark of your <S%H5797>strength.<s%>
Let your <S%H3548>priest<s%> be <S%H3847>clothed<s%> with <S%H6664>righteousness.<s%> Let your <S%H2623>saints<s%> shout for <S%H7442>joy!<s%>"
For your <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%>'s <S%H7725>sake,<s%> don't turn away the <S%H6440>face<s%> of your anointed <S%H4899>one.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has <S%H7650>sworn<s%> to <S%H1732>David<s%> in <S%H571>truth.<s%> He will not <S%H7725>turn<s%> from <S%H7896>it:<s%> "I will set the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of your <S%H990>body<s%> on your <S%H3678>throne.<s%>

If your <S%H1121>children<s%> will <S%H8104>keep<s%> my <S%H1285>covenant,<s%> my <S%H5713>testimony<s%> <S%H2090>that<s%> I will <S%H3925>teach<s%> <S%H1121>them,<s%> their children also will <S%H3427>sit<s%> on your <S%H3678>throne<s%> <S%H5703>forevermore.<s%>"
For <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has <S%H977>chosen<s%> <S%H6726>Zion.<s%> He has <S%H183>desired<s%> it for his <S%H4186>habitation.<s%>
"This is my <S%H4496>resting<s%> place <S%H5703>forever.<s%> Here I will <S%H3427>live,<s%> for I have desired <S%H183>it.<s%>
I will <S%H1288>abundantly<s%> <S%H1288>bless<s%> her <S%H6718>provision.<s%> I will <S%H7646>satisfy<s%> her <S%H34>poor<s%> with <S%H3899>bread.<s%>
Her <S%H3548>priests<s%> I will also <S%H3847>clothe<s%> with <S%H3468>salvation.<s%> Her <S%H2623>saints<s%> will shout <S%H7442>aloud<s%> for <S%H7444>joy.<s%>
There I will <S%H6779>make<s%> the <S%H7161>horn<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%> to <S%H6779>bud.<s%> I have <S%H6186>ordained<s%> a <S%H5216>lamp<s%> for my <S%H4899>anointed.<s%>
I will <S%H3847>clothe<s%> his <S%H341>enemies<s%> with <S%H1322>shame,<s%> but on <S%H5145>himself,<s%> his crown will be <S%H6692>resplendent.<s%>"
